Hollywood Treasure.plot: Hollywood Treasure is a weekly reality series that delves into the intricate world of showbiz and pop culture memorabilia collecting, including science fiction and fantasy props and costumes. The series follows Joe Maddalena, owner of Profiles in History and the world's largest auctioneer of original movie, television and pop culture collectibles.

Hot Set.title: Hot Set
Hot Set.plot: An extreme design challenge pitting two Hollywood production designers each week in a head-to-head battle to design, build, decorate and ultimately create an original and signature movie set that transports the viewer into an immersive world.

Hunters.title: Hunters
Hunters.actors: Nathan Phillips, Britne Oldford, Mark Coles Smith, Lewis Fitz-Gerald
Hunters.plot: Follows Flynn, a headstrong Baltimore FBI agent with a dark past, along with Regan, one of the government's most valuable operatives who may be keeping secrets of her own, and McCarthy, an unhinged junkie and Hunter cell leader.. Flynn's search for his missing wife leads him to a secret government unit assembled to hunt a group of ruthless terrorists - shadowy figures that may or may not be from this world.

Incorporated.title: Incorporated
Incorporated.actors: Sean Teale, Allison Miller, Eddie Ramos, Julia Ormond
Incorporated.plot: A man attempts to thwart a giant corporation that seems to have unlimited power.

Jim Henson's Creature Shop Challenge.title: Jim Henson's Creature Shop Challenge
Jim Henson's Creature Shop Challenge.actors: Melissa Doss, Russ Adams, Gigi Edgley, Brian Henson
Jim Henson's Creature Shop Challenge.plot: People from around the world are bringing back Jim Henson's creatures back to life by competing to see who is the better monster maker.

Joe Rogan Questions Everything.title: Joe Rogan Questions Everything
Joe Rogan Questions Everything.plot: Each week, Joe investigates a different area of the unexplained. One week it may be a government cover-up or an extraterrestrial encounter, and the next he'll be on the trail of a mythical creature that we've all heard about.

Killer Contact.title: Killer Contact
Killer Contact.actors: Austin Cook, Hector Barragan Jr., Molly O'Connolly, Darren O'Hare
Killer Contact.plot: Features a group of researchers who investigate reports of extreme and dangerous supernatural activity across the globe.

Legend Quest.title: Legend Quest
Legend Quest.writer: Jose C. Garcia de Letona, James Krieg
Legend Quest.actors: Annemarie Blanco, Oscar Cheda, Mayté Cordeiro, Andrés Couturier
Legend Quest.plot: In 19th Century America, 12 year old Leo and his ghost companions defend their world against supernatural threats.
Legend Quest.language: Spanish, English, Portuguese, French, Italian, German, Swedish, Norwegian, Finnish, Danish, Dutch, Mandarin, Vietnamese, Russian, Korean, Arabic, Turkish, Polish

Lost Girl.title: Lost Girl
Lost Girl.actors: Anna Silk, Kris Holden-Ried, Zoie Palmer, Rick Howland
Lost Girl.plot: Lost Girl focuses on the gorgeous and charismatic Bo, a supernatural being called a succubus who feeds on the energy of humans, sometimes with fatal results. Refusing to embrace her supernatural clan system and its rigid hierarchy, Bo is a renegade who takes up the fight for the underdog while searching for the truth about her own mysterious origins.

Marcel's Quantum Kitchen.title: Marcel's Quantum Kitchen
Marcel's Quantum Kitchen.actors: Devon Espinosa, Marcel Vigneron, Robyn Wilson
Marcel's Quantum Kitchen.plot: In each episode, Marcel and his new catering and event company will be hired by a demanding client to produce an extraordinary celebration or event. Based on the client's requests, Marcel will dream up a theme and cuisine for the event, which range from a fairytale graduation party and a Goth-rock fashion show to a birthday dinner held on a platform suspended in mid-air.

Monster Man.title: Monster Man
Monster Man.actors: Eric Jungmann, Justin Urich, Aimee Brooks, Michael Bailey Smith
Monster Man.plot: While driving in a highway to the wedding of his beloved Betty-Ann, Adam is surprised by his former schoolmate Harley on the backseat of his car. Adam has broken off with the inconvenient and moron Harley because of Betty-Ann. Along their road trip, Harley makes fun of some rednecks in a bar and later their car is chased by a giant monster truck on the road. After some incidents, they give a lift to the hitchhiker Sarah and sooner the trio is terrorized by a scary monster driving the monster truck.

Naked Vegas.title: Naked Vegas
Naked Vegas.actors: Heather Aguilera, Red Belmonte, Nix Herrera, Orlando Lara
Naked Vegas.plot: Explores the world of body painting art - set in the fast-paced glitter of life on the Las Vegas Strip. Follows one of Vegas' most innovative body art companies as artists collaborate on major client jobs while navigating the economics of the business.

Olympus.title: Olympus
Olympus.actors: Tom York, Sonya Cassidy, Sonita Henry, Matt Frewer
Olympus.plot: Olympus centers on how a few brave men and women banished the gods to the realm of the unconscious: a place they called the Underworld, or the Kingdom of Hades. The series follows Hero on his journey as he transforms from a fresh-faced and raw young man to a ruthless leader of man and match for the gods themselves.

Opposite Worlds.title: Opposite Worlds
Opposite Worlds.actors: Luke Tipple, Sansonetti Frank, Jesse Wilson, Mercy Ukpolo
Opposite Worlds.plot: A group of contestants live in isolation from the outside world in a custom built "house", constantly under video surveillance.

Paranormal Witness.title: Paranormal Witness
Paranormal Witness.actors: Daniel Cannis, Frances Townend, Robert Nolan, Colin Murphy
Paranormal Witness.plot: Series brings to life the stories of people who have lived through paranormal experiences that defy explanation.

Primeval: New World.title: Primeval: New World
Primeval: New World.writer: Gillian Horvath, Garfield Reeves-Stevens, Judith Reeves-Stevens
Primeval: New World.actors: Niall Matter, Sara Canning, Danny Rahim, Crystal Lowe
Primeval: New World.plot: A North American spin-off of the hit U.K. television series, PRIMEVAL: NEW WORLD follows a specialized team of animal experts and scientists that investigates the appearance of temporal anomalies and battles both prehistoric and futuristic creatures.

School Spirits.title: School Spirits
School Spirits.actors: Ben Broad, Ben Leasure, Justin Morck, Gabriella Baldacchino
School Spirits.plot: Executive Producer Mark Burnett joins forces with Seth Jarrett and Julie Insogna, creators of the hit series Celebrity Ghost Stories, to take viewers on a spooky thrill ride through some of the most infamously haunted colleges and high schools nationwide. Students, alumni, and faculty share their intimate paranormal encounters while their experiences are brought to life in Jarrett's arresting style of storytelling. Every campus has its secrets...

Sinbad.title: Sinbad
Sinbad.actors: Elliot Knight, Marama Corlett, Elliot Cowan, Junix Inocian
Sinbad.plot: A Persian prisoner sets out to find his dead brother with help from his misfit group.

Stranded.title: Stranded
Stranded.actors: Christian Slater, Amy Matysio, Michael Therriault, Brendan Fehr
Stranded.plot: The Lunar Base Ark is hit by a meteor shower and has severe damage. Colonel Gerard Brauchman sends Ava Cameron to repair a wing that is full of carbon monoxide. Dr. Lance Krauss warns that the gas may cause paranoia and hallucinations. Ava brings a sample of the meteor for analysis and Dr. Krauss finds that there are spores attached to the meteor. Ava accidentally cuts her finger in a sample but she hides the cut from the doctor. Soon Ava gets pregnant and delivers an alien offspring. Brauchman and Kraus believe that Ava is delusional. The offspring bites the crewman Bruce Johns and produces a clone of him.

Superstition.title: Superstition
Superstition.writer: Galen Thompson (screenplay), Michael O. Sajbel (story), Bret Thompson Plate (story), Brad White (story)
Superstition.actors: James Houghton, Albert Salmi, Lynn Carlin, Larry Pennell
Superstition.plot: A family moves into a long-condemned New England household with a big pond out back that everybody loves to swim in. Soon, however, they find that the pond was the site of the execution- by-drowning of a witch three hundred years before, and she's back to revenge herself on anybody nearby, whether they're Catholic or not.

The Expanse.title: The Expanse
The Expanse.actors: Steven Strait, Cas Anvar, Dominique Tipper, Wes Chatham
The Expanse.plot: Two hundred years in the future, in a fully colonized solar system, police detective Josephus Miller (Thomas Jane), who was born in the asteroid belt, is given the assignment to find a missing young woman; Julie Mao (Florence Faivre). Meanwhile, James Holden (Steven Strait), the first officer of an ice freighter, is witness to an unprovoked attack upon the ship, by craft believed to be from Mars (MCRN Federation). As news of the attack spreads throughout the system, the incident's flow-on threatens to destabilize already tenuous relations between Earth, Mars and The Belt. Far away from the struggles in deep space, on Earth, Chrisjen Avasarala (Shohreh Aghdashloo), a powerful United Nations executive and diplomat, works to prevent war between Earth and Mars by any means. Soon, the 3 find out the missing woman and the ice freighter's fate are part of a vast covert conspiracy which threatens all humanity.

The Internet Ruined My Life.title: The Internet Ruined My Life
The Internet Ruined My Life.actors: Michael Adragna, Bobby Allan, David Bongiorno, Michael Chiang
The Internet Ruined My Life.plot: Dramatization of incidents where users gave out too much information and drew negative attention to themselves and family.

Total Blackout.title: Total Blackout
Total Blackout.plot: A half-hour game show which places contestants in complete darkness to compete in challenges

Troy.title: Troy
Troy.actors: Julian Glover, Brian Cox, Nathan Jones, Adoni Maropis
Troy.plot: As the Greeks fall, they decided to head back home. King Priam decides to have one last battle with the Greeks to leave Troy for good. It was a night battle so the Greeks didn't knew, raining them down with flaming arrows and lighting huge balls of dry branches and rolling them down at the beach. It was a battle that Achilles wasn't in, but his cousin Patroclus pretended to be him by wearing his armor, his sword, his helmet, and his moves. Hector finally had a battle with Achilles not knowing it wasn't him. Patroclus was fast but Hector was faster, causing him to cut Patroclus's neck and finishing him with a sword to the heart.
Troy.awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 4 wins & 21 nominations.

Weird or What?.title: Weird or What?
Weird or What?.plot: From medical oddities to abnormal natural disasters to puzzling disappearances,this investigative series delves into all manner of mysteries. With William Shatner as your host

WWE NXT.title: WWE NXT
WWE NXT.actors: Darren Matthews, Drake Wuertz, Matt Polinsky, Nick McNeil
WWE NXT.plot: Wrestlers will portray heroes or villains as they follow a series of events that build tension and culminate in a wrestling match or series of matches.

Earthsea.title: Earthsea
Earthsea.actors: Sebastian Roché, Chris Gauthier, Jennifer Calvert, Emily Hampshire
Earthsea.plot: A reckless youth is destined to become the greatest sorcerer that the mystical land of Earthsea has ever known. When the young wizard Ged discovers that he possesses infinite magical powers, he seeks to master the ancient arts. As he journeys to manhood, he will combat dragons, fall in love, cross death's threshold, and ultimately wield the power to reunite a kingdom.
Earthsea.awards: Nominated for 1 Primetime Emmy. Another 7 wins & 7 nominations.

The Simpsons.title: The Simpsons
The Simpsons.writer: James L. Brooks, Matt Groening, Sam Simon
The Simpsons.actors: Dan Castellaneta, Nancy Cartwright, Harry Shearer, Julie Kavner
The Simpsons.plot: The Simpsons is an animated sitcom about the antics of a dysfunctional family called the Simpsons (surprise surprise). Homer is the oafish unhealthy beer loving father, Marge is the hardworking homemaker wife, Bart is the ten year old underachiever (and proud of it), Lisa is the unappreciated eight year old genius, and Maggie is the cute, pacifier loving silent infant.
The Simpsons.language: English, Spanish, Albanian, French, Japanese, German, Russian, Hindi, Swahili, Italian, Swedish, Turkish, Cantonese, Mandarin, Hebrew, Arabic, Klingon, Bengali, Czech
The Simpsons.awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 168 wins & 302 nominations.

Family Guy.title: Family Guy
Family Guy.actors: Seth MacFarlane, Alex Borstein, Seth Green, Mila Kunis
Family Guy.plot: Sick, twisted and politically incorrect, the animated series features the adventures of the Griffin family. Endearingly ignorant Peter and his stay-at-home wife Lois reside in Quahog, R.I., and have three kids. Meg, the eldest child, is a social outcast, and teenage Chris is awkward and clueless when it comes to the opposite sex. The youngest, Stewie, is a genius baby bent on killing his mother and destroying the world. The talking dog, Brian, keeps Stewie in check while sipping martinis and sorting through his own life issues.
Family Guy.awards: Won 7 Primetime Emmys. Another 27 wins & 86 nominations.

Bob's Burgers.title: Bob's Burgers
Bob's Burgers.actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman, John Roberts
Bob's Burgers.plot: Bob's Burgers centers on the Belcher family (consists of Bob, Linda, Tina, Gene and Louise) who own a hamburger restaurant. Bob's burgers are really delicious and appear to be better than his rivals' but when it comes to selling burgers, his kids aren't really helpful, as more customers head over to Jimmy Pesto's restaurant.
Bob's Burgers.awards: Won 2 Primetime Emmys. Another 7 wins & 42 nominations.

Rel.title: Rel
Rel.writer: Kevin Barnett, Lil Rel Howery, Josh Rabinowitz
Rel.actors: Lil Rel Howery, Jessica 'Jess Hilarious' Moore, Jordan L. Jones, Sinbad
Rel.plot: A successful comic tries to put his life back on track after his marriage falls apart.

Last Man Standing.title: Last Man Standing
Last Man Standing.writer: Ryûzô Kikushima (story), Akira Kurosawa (story), Walter Hill (screenplay)
Last Man Standing.actors: Bruce Willis, Bruce Dern, William Sanderson, Christopher Walken
Last Man Standing.plot: John Smith is an amoral gunslinger in the days of Prohibition. On the lam from his latest (unspecified) exploits, he happens upon the town of Jericho, Texas. Actually, calling Jericho a town would be too generous--it has become more like a ghost town, since two warring gangs have 'driven off all the decent folk.' Smith sees this as an opportunity to play both sides off against each other, earning himself a nice piece of change as a hired gun. Despite his strictly avowed mercenary intentions, he finds himself risking his life for his, albeit skewed, sense of honor....

The Cool Kids.title: The Cool Kids
The Cool Kids.actors: David Alan Grier, Martin Mull, Leslie Jordan, Vicki Lawrence
The Cool Kids.plot: Three friends at a retirement center have their comfortable existence rattled by a newcomer to the community.

Prison Break.title: Prison Break
Prison Break.actors: Dominic Purcell, Wentworth Miller, Robert Knepper, Amaury Nolasco
Prison Break.plot: An innocent man is framed for the homicide of the Vice President's brother and scheduled to be executed at a super-max penitentiary, thus it's up to his younger brother to save him with his genius scheme: install himself in the same prison by holding up a bank and, as the final month ticks away, launch the escape plan step-by-step to break the both of them out, with his full-body tattoo acting as his guide; a tattoo which hides the layout of the prison facility and necessary clues vital to the escape.
Prison Break.awards: Nominated for 2 Golden Globes. Another 4 wins & 26 nominations.

Gotham.title: Gotham
Gotham.actors: Ben McKenzie, Donal Logue, David Mazouz, Cory Michael Smith
Gotham.plot: In crime ridden Gotham City, Thomas and Martha Wayne are murdered before young Bruce Wayne's eyes. Although the idealistic Gotham City Police Dept. detective James Gordon, and his cynical partner, Harvey Bullock, seem to solve the case quickly, things are not so simple. Inspired by Bruce's traumatized desire for justice, Gordon vows to find it amid Gotham's corruption. Thus begins Gordon's lonely quest that would set him against his own comrades and the underworld with their own deadly rivalries and mysteries. In the coming wars, innocence will be lost and compromises will be made as some criminals will fall as casualties while others will rise as supervillains. All the while, young Bruce observes this war with a growing obsession that would one day drive him to seek his own justice against the evil of Gotham as The Batman.
Gotham.awards: Won 1 Primetime Emmy. Another 5 wins & 44 nominations.

Empire.title: Empire
Empire.actors: Terrence Howard, Bryshere Y. Gray, Jussie Smollett, Trai Byers
Empire.plot: Lucious, the founder and CEO of a successful record label has been diagnosed with ALS. He must choose one of his three sons to take over the company when he dies. Meanwhile, his ex wife and co-founder, Cookie, has been released from prison and wants to reclaim her rightful place in the company.
Empire.awards: Won 1 Golden Globe. Another 23 wins & 84 nominations.

Lethal Weapon.title: Lethal Weapon
Lethal Weapon.actors: Mel Gibson, Danny Glover, Gary Busey, Mitchell Ryan
Lethal Weapon.plot: Martin Riggs is an L.A. cop with suicidal tendencies and Roger Murtaugh is the unlucky police officer with whom Riggs is assigned. Together they uncover a huge drug-smuggling operation, and as their success rate grows so does their friendship.
Lethal Weapon.awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 5 wins & 1 nomination.

Star.title: Star
Star.actors: Clive Owen, Michael Beattie, Toru Tanaka Jr., DTeflon
Star.plot: The Driver now carries an arrogant rock star who is visiting a major city (not Pittsburgh as earlier believed). Played by Madonna, this title character wants to get away from her bodyguards in the Driver's BMW. He soon gets tired of her and decides to have a bit of fun.

The Orville.title: The Orville
The Orville.actors: Seth MacFarlane, Adrianne Palicki, Penny Johnson Jerald, Scott Grimes
The Orville.plot: Set 400 years in the future, the show follows the adventures of the Orville, a not-so-top-of-the-line exploratory ship in Earth's interstellar Fleet. Facing cosmic challenges from without and within, this motley crew of space explorers will boldly go where no comedic drama has gone before.

The Gifted.title: The Gifted
The Gifted.actors: Stephen Moyer, Amy Acker, Sean Teale, Natalie Alyn Lind
The Gifted.plot: In a world where mutated humans are treated with distrust and fear, an institute for mutants battles to achieve peaceful co-existence with humanity.

9-1-1.writer: Brad Falchuk, Tim Minear, Ryan Murphy
9-1-1.actors: Angela Bassett, Peter Krause, Oliver Stark, Aisha Hinds
9-1-1.plot: Explores the high-pressure experiences of the first responders who are thrust into the most frightening, shocking and heart-stopping situations.

The Resident.title: The Resident
The Resident.actors: Hilary Swank, Jeffrey Dean Morgan, Lee Pace, Christopher Lee
The Resident.plot: In New York, Dr. Juliet Bliss Devereau of the Brooklyn General Hospital has ended her relationship with her boyfriend Jack and is seeking an apartment in Brooklyn to live alone. She finds a bargain in an old apartment building owned by the handsome and lonely Max and one night she misinterprets his signals and dates him. However she concludes that it is too soon to have a love affair... but is that really the end of it?

Hell's Kitchen.title: Hell's Kitchen
Hell's Kitchen.actors: Gordon Ramsay, Jason Thompson, Andi Van Willigan, Scott Leibfried
Hell's Kitchen.plot: World renowned chef Gordon Ramsay puts aspiring young chefs through rigorous cooking challenges and dinner services at his restaurant in Hollywood, "Hell's Kitchen", to determine which one of them will win the head chef position at one of his restaurants or a restaurant located worldwide.
Hell's Kitchen.awards: Nominated for 5 Primetime Emmys. Another 5 wins & 10 nominations.

So You Think You Can Dance.title: So You Think You Can Dance
So You Think You Can Dance.actors: Nigel Lythgoe, Cat Deeley, Mark Thompson, Mary Murphy
So You Think You Can Dance.plot: Dancers skilled in everything from ballroom and ballet to salsa, jive, hip-hop and krumping, all compete to be named the best. Dancers must impress the judges with their moves and rigorous routines in order to survive the auditions and be invited to Hollywood. Producers traveled to Chicago, New York and Los Angeles in search of dancers who represent the soul and rhythm of America. Some dancers wow the judges, while others leave them speechless. See who struts into the producers' hearts and who trips up on the series premiere. A fortunate 50 dancers who survive the auditions will go to Hollywood to work with five of the top choreographers in the business: Alex Da Silva, Brian Friedman, Dan Karaty, Mia Michaels and Mary Murphy. During the "Hollywood Week," the semifinalists will dance their hearts out, as they learn challenging routines and hope to impress the choreographers.
So You Think You Can Dance.awards: Won 15 Primetime Emmys. Another 5 wins & 71 nominations.

MasterChef.title: Masterchef
MasterChef.writer: Adeline Ramage Rooney, Ben Adler, Robin Ashbrook, Pat Llewellyn, Howard T. Owens, Gordon Ramsay
MasterChef.actors: Gordon Ramsay, Charlie Ryan, Joe Bastianich, Graham Elliot
MasterChef.plot: A nationwide search for the best home cooks in America. One of 50 hopefuls will become a culinary star and one of America's "Masterchefs."
MasterChef.awards: Won 1 Primetime Emmy. Another 8 wins & 8 nominations.

MasterChef Junior.title: MasterChef Junior
MasterChef Junior.writer: Adeline Ramage Rooney, Robin Ashbrook, Gordon Ramsay, Pat Llewellyn, Howard T. Owens
MasterChef Junior.actors: Gordon Ramsay, Joe Bastianich, Charlie Ryan, Graham Elliot
MasterChef Junior.plot: 24 of the best junior home cooks in the country between the ages of eight and 13 will compete in the first audition round and present their dishes to the judges.
MasterChef Junior.awards: Nominated for 1 Primetime Emmy. Another 10 nominations.

Beat Shazam.title: Beat Shazam
Beat Shazam.actors: Jamie Foxx, DJ Irie, October Gonzalez, Corinne Foxx
Beat Shazam.plot: Teams of two race to identify songs by sound in hopes of winning up to $1 million. Whoever wins the most $ gets to play the final round against Shazam - the show's computer. Actor Jamie Foxx and his daughter Corinne as DJ host the show.

The Four: Battle for Stardom.title: The Four: Battle for Stardom
The Four: Battle for Stardom.actors: Fergie, Sean 'Diddy' Combs, DJ Khaled, Meghan Trainor
The Four: Battle for Stardom.plot: During "The Four," four finalists are selected. New contestants then challenge the finalists each week to steal one of the four slots. The winner is named in the season finale.

Teen Choice Awards.actors: Ashley Benson, Zooey Deschanel, Taylor Swift, Jonah Hill

Ice Age: A Mammoth Christmas.plot: When Sid accidentally destroys Manny's heirloom Christmas rock and ends up on Santa's naughty list, he leads a hilarious quest to the North Pole to make things right and ends up making things much worse. Now it's up to Manny and his prehistoric posse to band together and save Christmas for the entire world.

Ice Age: The Great Egg-Scapade.title: Ice Age: The Great Egg-Scapade
Ice Age: The Great Egg-Scapade.director: Paul Stodolny, Ricardo Curtis, Steve Martino, Mike Thurmeier
Ice Age: The Great Egg-Scapade.actors: Blake Anderson, Tyree Brown, David Cowgill, Jennifer Elrod
Ice Age: The Great Egg-Scapade.plot: Scrat, Manny, Sid, Diego and the rest of your prehistoric pals from Ice Age are back for an all-new hilarious animated adventure! Business is booming at Sid's new egg-sitting service but when the dastardly pirate bunny Squint steals the eggs, Manny, Diego, and the rest of the gang take off on a daring rescue mission that turns into the world's first egg hunt.

A Christmas Story Live!.title: A Christmas Story Live!
A Christmas Story Live!.writer: Jean Shepherd (based on the screenplay by), Leigh Brown (based on the screenplay by), Bob Clark (based on the screenplay by), Jean Shepherd (based on the novel "In God We Trust,  All Others Pay Cash" by), Joseph Robinette (based on the stage musican "A Christmas Story": book by), Benj Pasek (based on the stage musican "A Christmas Story": music and lyrics by), Justin Paul (based on the stage musican "A Christmas Story": music and lyrics by), Robert Cary (teleplay by), Jonathan Tolins (teleplay by)
A Christmas Story Live!.actors: Maya Rudolph, Chris Diamantopoulos, Ana Gasteyer, Tyler Wladis
A Christmas Story Live!.plot: A live broadcast of the Broadway hit "A Christmas Story: The Musical" in which Ralphie wishes for nothing more than a Red Ryder BB Gun for Christmas.

Big 12.actors: Bridgette B., Courtney Cummz, Ashley Fires, Jynx Maze

Daytona 500.title: Daytona 500
Daytona 500.actors: Richard Petty, Darrell Waltrip, A.J. Foyt, Donnie Allison
Daytona 500.plot: In May 1978 CBS Television signed on to broadcast the biggest race of NASCAR's Winston Cup Grand National series live from start to finish. The Daytona 500 was aired on February 18, 1979 amid driving snow along much of the Atlantic Coast; rain briefly delayed the start of the 500 but the green flag flew with 16 laps complete. The event's favored driver was Buddy Baker, driving an Oldsmobile prepared by the Harry Ranier racing team that won the pole for the event. However, the real battle for the lead involved Cale Yarborough, Donnie and Bobby Allison, little-known driver Tighe Scott, Darrell Waltrip, A.J. Foyt, and the sport's highest-winning driver Richard Petty. Following 190 often chaotic competitive laps the final laps of the race shook out to a showdown between Donnie Allison and Cale Yarborough, who had lost a lap early in the race after a spin but had erased the gap and were 1-2 as they entered what proved to be one of the defining final laps in racing history.

NFC Championship Game.title: 1993 NFC Championship Game
NFC Championship Game.actors: Pat Summerall, John Madden, Greg Gumbel, Terry Bradshaw

The Masked Singer.plot: Talent competition in which the contestants wear masks. U.S. version of the Korean game show, 'The Masked Singer'.

American Dad!.title: American Dad!

American Dad!.actors: Seth MacFarlane, Wendy Schaal, Dee Bradley Baker, Scott Grimes
American Dad!.plot: Stan Smith, who works for the CIA and is constantly on the alert for terrorist activity, will go to extremes to protect his beloved America from harm; as evidenced by the terror-alert color code on his fridge, and his frequent knee-jerk reaction of shooting holes in the toaster whenever the toast pops up. In addition to Stan's wife and teenage children, the Smith household has two rather unconventional members. There's Roger, the sarcastic space alien who rescued Stan from Area 51 who deeply resents the fact that he's not allowed to leave the house, and therefore, has been reduced to drinking wine and smoking cigarettes, and Klaus, a lascivious, German-speaking goldfish; the result of a CIA experiment gone seriously wrong where the CIA tried to give a fish a German man's brain. Stan's son is a dorky teenager who tries to be cool. His wife has had a past life of sex and drugs.
American Dad!.awards: Nominated for 3 Primetime Emmys. Another 1 win & 24 nominations.

TBS.title: TBS Pathfinders
TBS.writer: Myrna Moore, Brian Parker, Will Payne, Michael Watchulonis
TBS.plot: These trailblazers, entrepreneurs, and leaders have changed the world with stunning acts of kindness and tireless dedication.

Axe Cop.title: Axe Cop
Axe Cop.writer: Judah Miller, Nick Weidenfeld, Ethan Nicolle, Malachai Nicolle
Axe Cop.actors: Nick Offerman, Ken Marino, Rob Huebel, Megan Mullally
Axe Cop.plot: The adventures of an axe-wielding police officer dedicated to killing the various bad guys he comes across.

Bordertown.title: Bordertown
Bordertown.actors: Maya Zapata, Irineo Alvarez, Rene Rivera, Jennifer Lopez
Bordertown.plot: Lauren, an impassioned American reporter for the Chicago Sentinel heads to Juarez, a Mexican bordertown, in order to investigate a series of mysterious slayings involving young factory women from all over Mexico. As she discovers hundreds of victims, she gains the trust of local factory workers but falls into danger.
Bordertown.language: English, Spanish, Central American Indian languages

Golan the Insatiable.title: Golan the Insatiable
Golan the Insatiable.writer: Dave Jeser, Josh Miller, Matthew Silverstein, Angela Petrella
Golan the Insatiable.actors: Maria Bamford, Rachel Butera, Matthew Silverstein, Nicholas Rutherford
Golan the Insatiable.plot: Golan is the dark lord of an alternate universe that comes to our world and is befriended by a little goth girl and her family. Buffoonery ensues as he deals with everyday life.

High School USA!.title: High School USA!
High School USA!.actors: Nathan Barnatt, Vincent Kartheiser, T.J. Miller, Mandy Moore
High School USA!.plot: Join the super-positive, millennial students of High School USA, as they confront all the unique challenges of growing up in a modern world. Led by the painfully naïve and always upbeat Marsh Merriwether, there is nothing these kids can't put a positive spin on, from cyber-bullying to pill-addiction to embarrassing texting incidents.

Lucas Bros. Moving Co..title: Lucas Bros Moving Co
Lucas Bros. Moving Co..actors: Kenneth Lucas, Jerrod Carmichael, Keith Lucas, Hannibal Buress
Lucas Bros. Moving Co..plot: The stand-up comedy of New York-based identical twins Kenny and Keith Lucas (The Lucas Brothers) gets animated. With the help of the people of Greenpoint, the twins run a moving company called Lucas Bros. Moving Co. Their customers are often apprehensive to hire such a scrawny duo, but the brothers like to remind them that that's why God made two of them.

Napoleon Dynamite.title: Napoleon Dynamite
Napoleon Dynamite.actors: Jon Heder, Jon Gries, Aaron Ruell, Efren Ramirez
Napoleon Dynamite.plot: Preston, Idaho's most curious resident, Napoleon Dynamite, lives with his grandma and his 32-year-old brother (who cruises chat rooms for ladies) and works to help his best friend, Pedro, snatch the Student Body President title from mean teen Summer Wheatley.

The PJs.title: The PJs
The PJs.writer: Eddie Murphy, Steve Tompkins, Larry Wilmore
The PJs.actors: Loretta Devine, Ja'net DuBois, Michele Morgan, Pepe Serna
The PJs.plot: Thurgood Stubbs lives with his wife Muriel in the housing project where he is the chief superintendent. The show, created by Eddie Murphy (who provides Stubbs' voice), follows the adventures of the Stubbs family and the others in the building, animated through a process called 'Foamation.'
The PJs.awards: Won 3 Primetime Emmys. Another 2 wins & 8 nominations.

Son of Zorn.title: Son of Zorn
Son of Zorn.actors: Cheryl Hines, Johnny Pemberton, Tim Meadows, Artemis Pebdani
Son of Zorn.plot: Animation and live action collide when a cartoon Barbarian dad leaves his war-torn village to re-connect with his moody, non-animated teenage son in suburbia.

Action Man.title: Action Man
Action Man.writer: J.M. Flynn (novel), Alphonse Boudard (adaptation), Alphonse Boudard (dialogue), Jean Delannoy (adaptation)
Action Man.actors: Jean Gabin, Robert Stack, Margaret Lee, Jean Topart
Action Man.plot: Sophisticated crook talks ex-crook and now respectable business man into one last caper. This highly planned and well executed crime goes off without a hitch until rival bad guys want a piece of the action.

Alvin and the Chipmunks.title: Alvin and the Chipmunks
Alvin and the Chipmunks.writer: Jon Vitti (screenplay), Will McRobb (screenplay), Chris Viscardi (screenplay), Jon Vitti (story), Ross Bagdasarian (characters Alvin and the Chipmunks)
Alvin and the Chipmunks.actors: Jason Lee, David Cross, Cameron Richardson, Jane Lynch
Alvin and the Chipmunks.plot: In a tree farm, three musically inclined chipmunks, Alvin, Simon and Theodore, find their tree cut down and sent to Los Angeles. Once there, they meet the frustrated songwriter David Seville, and despite a poor house wrecking first impression, they impress him with their singing talent. Seeing the opportunity for success, both human and chipmunks make a pact for them to sing his songs. While that ambition proves a frustrating struggle with the difficult trio, the dream does come true after all. However, that success presents its own trials as their unscrupulous record executive, Ian Hawke, plans to break up this family to exploit the boys. Can Dave and the Chipmunks discover what they really value amid the superficial glamor around them?

The Adrenaline Project.title: The Adrenaline Project
The Adrenaline Project.plot: Each week, The Adrenaline Project takes five thrill-seeking teens and dares them to compete head-to-head through intense physical and mental challenges. Only three will survive elimination and earn a chance to put it all on the line in our final mystery competition to walk away with the prizes and the glory. We begin as our contestants are dropped at Base Camp for training with Boomer; an often-imposing wedge of a man with a light but twisted sense of humour. He'll put each crew of teens through a boot camp of his own design a pair of obstacle courses that test the skill, strength, speed and endurance that will be needed to complete the unknown challenge that lies ahead. When the dust settles, Boomer will have eliminated two contestants and the remaining three will join our host, Caz, at the final mystery challenge. But this ending is just the beginning as Caz dares our remaining three to complete the heart-stopping, Adrenaline-jacked final event. With no knowledge of what lies ahead, they'll compete head-to-head as they wakeboard, zipline, riversurf, white water kayak or even bungee jump to earn the right to walk away as the champ! With cameras following them every step of the way, we'll see the fears, the frustrations and the anticipation of our contestants, as they struggle to conquer a challenge unlike anything they've experienced before. Each week, new competitors will discover and surpass their personal limits - teeth clenched; hearts racing and emotions on their sleeves - as they reach for glory, and the bragging rights and the prizes that come with it!

Angela Anaconda.title: Angela Anaconda
Angela Anaconda.actors: Sue Rose, Bryn McAuley, Al Mukadam, Ruby Smith-Merovitz
Angela Anaconda.plot: Angela Anaconda and her three best friends Gordy, Gina, and Johnny are all a bunch of outcast individuals. The series focuses on the adventures that the friends have. Angela is the leader of the group who also has a vivid imagination. Gina is the stereotypical chubby girl. Johnny is the blue haired Elvis wannabe, and Gordy is the token nerd of the group. They assist Angela in her battles with her older brothers, and finding any way that they can stand up to the rich, French, teacher's pet, Nanette.

Archie's Weird Mysteries.title: Archie's Weird Mysteries
Archie's Weird Mysteries.actors: Ben Beck, Jill Anderson, Terry Berner, Jerry Longe
Archie's Weird Mysteries.plot: Archie Andrews is a fickle, freckled fellow who's in a love triangle with the likeable Betty Cooper and the spoiled Veronica Lodge, a battle of wits with Reggie Mantle, and a friendship with Judghead Jones. Other characters include principal Mr. Weatherbee "The Bee" Big Ethel, who has a crush on Jughead, and the nerdy Dilton Doiley. Archie publishes an article in the school newspaper called "Archie's Weird Mysteries", which chronicles his exploits investigating strange phenomena. His adventures deal with time travelers, aliens, monsters (often creations of Dilton) and various other oddities. He also writes in his laptop journal at the end of every day, and always ends off his installment with the words: "...in a little town called Riverdale."

Alien Racers.title: Alien Racers
Alien Racers.plot: Xenoc, the heart of the universe, holds the valuable energy source known as Xeno-energy. It has the power to create or destroy. For eons, this cosmic energy gathered and destroyed civilizations until the wisest and oldest species, Zenterrans, managed to land containment chambers on the planet surface. Fearing that every race would be waring over the contained energy, Master Khadan issued a contest. Each alien civilization would choose their champion for this great power and whoever controls the Xeno-energy will decide the fate of the universe. Since the Zenterrans were extending their neutrality, even the Kragnans would come. The Kragnans, a race of fierce crablike creatures who travel in space ships made of lava and land vehicles made of bones, have enslaved or eaten half of the universe. They seek more energy for hatching their new generation of eggs. The protagonist, Ultrox, knows there is more to Xeno-energy than even the Zenterrans know. Just then, he notices a Kragnan ship on a crash course. He saves its imprisoned occupant, Jek, from a squad of Klaw Troopers. Just before he was vaporized by another Kragnan ship, the gangster named Seadrok accidentally dropped his space anchor on the ship, thus saving his life. After a little persuasion by dropping Ne'tal champion G'rog, Ultrox joins the races.

Alienators: Evolution Continues.title: Alienators: Evolution Continues
Alienators: Evolution Continues.actors: Kirby Morrow, Andrew Francis, Mark Acheson, Tony Alcantar
Alienators: Evolution Continues.plot: Taking up where the movie Evolution (2001) left off, this animated series features Dr. Ira Kane, Dr. Henry Block, Wayne Green, along with new character Lt. Lucy, as they try to stop the spreading of the alien organisms known as the Genus. Each episode features the Genus evolving into a new form of life, infecting the Earth.

A.J.'s Time Travelers.title: A.J.'s Time Travelers
A.J.'s Time Travelers.actors: Jeremiah Birkett, Larry Cedar, Teresa Jones, Patty Maloney
A.J.'s Time Travelers.plot: Through a new computer software, fifteen-year-old A.J. Malloy is transported to a time travelling ship called Kryos, of which he is made Captain. With his eccentric crew of Ollie, Izzy, ...

Animaniacs.title: Animaniacs
Animaniacs.actors: Rob Paulsen, Tress MacNeille, Jess Harnell, Frank Welker
Animaniacs.plot: Ensemble cast of off-the-wall Warner Brothers characters, appearing in a wide variety of roles. Wakko, Yakko, and Dot Warner, are WB Studio creations who were just too "zany" to be of any use to the studio. Pinky and the Brain are two mice bent on world domination. Rita and Runt are a cat and dog team, who get into perilous situations every episode, put always seem to find time to sing a song. Bobby, Pesto, and Squit are the Goodfeathers, part of a New York City mob of pigeons, who worship Martin Scorsese. Slappy the Squirrel is a late middle-age squirrel. She starred in a series of popular cartoons in the Golden Age. Buttons is a watch-dog, charged with watching the mischievous toddler, Mindy. Chicken Boo is a giant chicken trying to integrate into human society. Flavio and Marita are two urbane hippopotami.

Attack of the Killer Tomatoes.title: Attack of the Killer Tomatoes
Attack of the Killer Tomatoes.actors: John Astin, Christian Guzek, Kath Soucie, Neil Ross
Attack of the Killer Tomatoes.plot: The evil Dr Gangreen has created an army of mutant killer tomatoes to help him take over the world. During the mutation process he throws out one that's too big and slow, but it mixes with another experiment, and is transformed into a pretty girl! She escapes with one of the tomatoes, is chased, and gets rescued by a pizza-delivery boy. Together, they must try to thwart Gangreen's plots and rescue his tomatoes when possible, aided by Tara's mutant vegetable powers.

Budgie the Little Helicopter.title: Budgie the Little Helicopter
Budgie the Little Helicopter.actors: Richard Pearce, Jeremy Nicholas, Ray Lonnen, Anthony Jackson

Batman: The Animated Series.title: Batman: The Animated Series
Batman: The Animated Series.writer: Bill Finger, Bob Kane, Eric Radomski, Bruce Timm, Paul Dini
Batman: The Animated Series.actors: Kevin Conroy, Efrem Zimbalist Jr., Robert Hastings
Batman: The Animated Series.plot: Heir to the Wayne family fortune, Bruce Wayne lives by day as a seemingly lavish playboy millionaire socialite, but by night assumes the role of his crime-fighting alter-ego: the caped crusader known as Batman. Throughout the Animated Series, Batman receives help from sidekicks Robin and Batgirl, as well as Police Commissioner Gordon, in protecting the streets of Gotham City from a large rogue's gallery of criminals, lunatics and nemeses.
Batman: The Animated Series.awards: Won 1 Primetime Emmy. Another 3 wins & 19 nominations.

Biker Mice from Mars.title: Biker Mice from Mars
Biker Mice from Mars.genre: Animation, Action, Adventure, Comedy, Family, Sci-Fi
Biker Mice from Mars.actors: Dorian Harewood, Rob Paulsen, Ian Ziering, William Morgan Sheppard
Biker Mice from Mars.plot: When three alien motorcycle riding mice are forced to leave their home planet of Mars thanks to the evil mining Plutarkians, they rebel against their enemies on planet Earth and the city of Chicago.

Beetlejuice.title: Beetlejuice
Beetlejuice.writer: Michael McDowell (story), Larry Wilson (story), Michael McDowell (screenplay), Warren Skaaren (screenplay)
Beetlejuice.actors: Alec Baldwin, Geena Davis, Annie McEnroe, Maurice Page
Beetlejuice.plot: Adam and Barbara are a normal couple...who happen to be dead. They have given their precious time to decorate their house and make it their own, but unfortunately a family is moving in, and not quietly. Adam and Barbara try to scare them out, but end up becoming the main attraction to the money making family. They call upon Beetlejuice to help, but Beetlejuice has more in mind than just helping.

Beast Machines: Transformers.title: Beast Machines: Transformers
Beast Machines: Transformers.actors: Garry Chalk, Ian James Corlett, Scott McNeil, Venus Terzo
Beast Machines: Transformers.plot: The Maximals awaken on their home planet of Cybertron with no memory of how they got there and instead of being greeted by there own kind they are chased by mindless Veicons created by Megatron(II). The Maximals must free Cybertron from Megatron and restore it back to its organic life.

Beast Wars: Transformers.title: Beast Wars: Transformers
Beast Wars: Transformers.actors: Scott McNeil, Garry Chalk, Ian James Corlett, Richard Newman
Beast Wars: Transformers.plot: Two spaceships, one manned by benevolent Maximals, the other by evil Predacons, crash-land on a pre-humanoid planet while en route to Earth. Their crews assume indigenous animal forms to protect themselves from an overabundance of natural energy, transforming into robots to do battle. Thus, the Beast Wars have begun...

Bobby's World.title: Bobby's World
Bobby's World.writer: Howie Mandel, Jim Staahl, Jim Fisher
Bobby's World.actors: Howie Mandel, Gail Matthius, Kevin Smets, Charity James
Bobby's World.plot: A boy named Bobby Generic creates adventures using his overactive imagination.

Bratz.title: Bratz
Bratz.writer: Susan Estelle Jansen (screenplay), Adam De La Peña (story), David Eilenberg (story)
Bratz.actors: Logan Browning, Janel Parrish, Nathalia Ramos, Skyler Shaye
Bratz.plot: Four best friends start high school. Each one is unique and likes their own thing. When Meredith, the most popular girl, sees this she automatically knows they are trouble. Eventually though Cloe joins the soccer team and hangs out with them, Sasha joins the cheer leading squad and hangs out with the cheerleaders, Jade is part of the math club so she hangs out with them, and Yasmin is left all alone. After years of not talking to each other Jade and Yasmin speak a few words in the restroom but Yasmin doesn't have the courage to tell Jade she misses her. Then the four girls are reunited when they are sent to detention for causing a food fight. After the girls are reunited they find out they are not invited to a huge party given by Meredith Then Cloe finds out that her mom got a job serving food at the party. They are forced to work for Meredith Then at the party Meredith decides to expose Yasmins secret which is her dancing and singing with a face mask. Then Yasmins brother starts doing a dance and then everybody joins in and Meredith is humiliated. When Meredith accidentally gets thrown into the pool she calls the four best friends "bratz." The girls then decide to be part of the talent show to win a scholarship. Meredith is always the one who wins but the "bratz" are prepared to take her down. But when Meredith finds she threatens Yasmin by telling her that if she continued preparing for the show she would expose her friends secrets. Yasmin decides to call everything off. At the end the girls still do the talent show and they tell everybody there secrets who turn out not to be so bad. The girls win and they each end up with their crushes. The girls decide to give Cloe the scholarship. The movie ends with the girls walking down a red carpet.

Cybersix.title: Cybersix
Cybersix.actors: Cathy Weseluck, Michael Dobson, Alex Doduk, Janyse Jaud
Cybersix.plot: Cybersix is the name of a powerful advanced female genetic construct android who is the creation of malevolent scientist named Von Richter. He considers her a failed creation owing to her indomitable free will and she was forced to escape to avoid termination by her creator. Now she hides in regular society as a male teacher named Adrienne Seideleman, but she stalks the night as a caped superhero. Vowing eternal opposition to the plans of her creator and his henchmen, she protects her new found world and friend and seeks the humanity that her creator denied from her.

C Bear and Jamal.title: C-Bear and Jamal
C Bear and Jamal.plot: Jamal passes through his 10th birthday, and in the process of 'becoming a man', which is what this milestone means, he tries to give up childhood things, including C Bear, his teddy bear. C Bear and Jamal talk to each other, and C Bear can create imaginary scenarios for Jamal - he shows Jamal what adulthood can mean, and how passing 10 does not mean that all of childhood must be abandoned.

Cubix: Robots for Everyone.title: Cubix: Robots for Everyone
Cubix: Robots for Everyone.actors: Andrew Rannells, Veronica Taylor, Madeleine Blaustein, Rachael Lillis
Cubix: Robots for Everyone.plot: A boy who just moved to Bubbletown repairs a transformable robot named Cubix and becomes its owner. Together, along with the boys friends, they fight against the schemes of a mad doctor.

The Cramp Twins.title: The Cramp Twins
The Cramp Twins.actors: Tom Kenny, Kath Soucie, Nicole Oliver, Ian James Corlett
The Cramp Twins.plot: The story of a pair of non-identical twin brothers, Lucien and Wayne, who live with their hygiene-crazed mother and their western/country-crazed father in a small town called Soap City. Lucien is a delicate, nature-loving boy, while Wayne is a rough antisocial bully, whose only interest in life is junk. Naturally, some conflicts will ensue.

Digimon Adventure.title: Digimon Adventure
Digimon Adventure.actors: Hiroaki Hirata, Toshiko Fujita, Chika Sakamoto, Yûko Mizutani
Digimon Adventure.plot: An animated series based on the popular children's toy "Digimon", in which kids raise and train electronic monsters to fight against those raised by other kids. The show follows the adventures of a team of real monster trainers as they travel about honing the skills of their monsters and facing challenges from rival trainers, some of whom don't feel obliged to fight fair.

Digimon Adventure 02.title: Digimon Adventure 02
Digimon Adventure 02.actors: Robert Axelrod, Tifanie Christun, Brian Donovan, Doug Erholtz
Digimon Adventure 02.plot: 3 years after the DigiDestined beat Apocalymon, a new evil has arrived. Ken the Digimon Kaizer! Using his Black Digivice and Evil Rings, he takes control of the digimon. To complete this, he makes a Dark Tower in the area. With the power to digivolve being blocked, a new line of DigiDestined appear! Using their digimentals, they begin to fight with the Kaizer. But when the Digimon Kaizer creates the Evil Spirals, will they still stand a chance?

Digimon Tamers.title: Digimon Tamers
Digimon Tamers.actors: Masako Nozawa, Yuka Imai, Makoto Tsumura, Mayumi Yamaguchi
Digimon Tamers.plot: An animated series based on the popular children's toy "Digimon", in which kids raise electronic monsters to fight against those raised by other kids. The show follows the adventures of a team of real monster trainers as they travel about honing their skills and facing challenges from rival trainers.

Dinozaurs.title: DinoZaurs
Dinozaurs.plot: An army of sentient transforming dinosaurs fight to defend the Earth from alien invaders.

Donkey Kong Country.title: Donkey Kong Country
Donkey Kong Country.actors: Richard Yearwood, Andrew Sabiston, Donald Burda
Donkey Kong Country.plot: Donkey Kong and his sidekick, Diddy Kong, star in a new computer-generated rendition of the classic video game. Donkey Kong isn't too smart, but he is the strongest monkey on the island of ...

Defenders of Dynatron City.title: Defenders of Dynatron City
Defenders of Dynatron City.writer: Bob Forward, Gary Winnick (creator), Steve Purcell (based on a concept developed by), Howard Roffman (based on a concept developed by), Gary Winnick (based on a concept developed by), Cynthia Wuthmann (based on a concept developed by)
Defenders of Dynatron City.actors: Whoopi Goldberg, Tim Curry, David Coburn, Pat Fraley

Dungeons and Dragons.title: The Making of 'Dungeons and Dragons'
Dungeons and Dragons.actors: Lee Arenberg, Charles Darby, Aladino V. Debert, Jeremy Irons
Dungeons and Dragons.plot: This video gives fantasy film and game fans a behind-the- scenes look at the making of the hit movie based on the classic Dungeons and Dragons role-playing game. Includes interviews with star Jeremy Irons, as well as other members of the cast and crew, who share their experiences with bringing the game to the silver screen.

Dog City.title: Dog City
Dog City.actors: Ron White, Elizabeth Hanna, Kevin Clash, John Stocker
Dog City.plot: Ace Hart is a private eye in Dog City, where all the characters are dogs, everyone is a wisecracker, and every canine pun ever thought of is used liberally. Most of his cases lead him to Bugsy, the Dogfather, and his hapless minions. Meanwhile, he discusses his cases and all manner of cartoon cliches with Elliott, his Muppet creator in the real world. As Elliott rushes to complete his stories through numerous distractions and within deadline, Ace regularly finds himself yanked between divergent storylines and impossibly-convenient plot threads.

Droopy, Master Detective.title: Droopy: Master Detective
Droopy, Master Detective.actors: Charlie Adler, Teresa Ganzel, Don Messick, Frank Welker
Droopy, Master Detective.plot: Droopy and his son Dripple are detectives on the mean streets of the city.

Di-Gata Defenders.title: Di-Gata Defenders
Di-Gata Defenders.actors: Noah Cappe, Martha MacIsaac, Alexander Conti, Dan Petronijevic
Di-Gata Defenders.plot: Di Gata Defenders was a television show that aired throughout the years 2007 2009 in various different continents. The show consisted of 6 Protagonists. and various Antagonists. The Di Gata Defenders were 4 teenagers who were set to defend their realm of RaDos against all the forces of evil that wish to destroy the peace. The 4 Defenders; Melosa, Seth, Kara, and Erik were the first characters introduced. The 4 managed to gain two extra friends. One loyal friend, Rion who happens to be the youngest after Kara is finished off.Rion was made a defender. They also managed to make a on-off friendship with the damaged "son" of one of the antagonists, the sons name is Adam. Adam decided not to become a defender but instead sent out to search for his Bio parents.

Eek! The Cat.title: Eek! The Cat Christmas Special
Eek! The Cat.actors: Shane Barbi, Sia Barbi, Bill Kopp

Escaflowne.title: Escaflowne
Escaflowne.actors: Kirby Morrow, Kelly Sheridan, Brian Drummond, Jocelyne Loewen
Escaflowne.plot: Hitomi is a girl with psychic abilities who gets transported to the magical world of Gaea. She and her friends find themselves under attack from the evil Zaibach empire, and the Guymelf Escaflowne provides the key to it all.

Eerie, Indiana.title: Eerie, Indiana
Eerie, Indiana.actors: Omri Katz, Justin Shenkarow, Mary-Margaret Humes, Francis Guinan
Eerie, Indiana.plot: Marshall Teller's family moves to the small country town of Eerie, Indiana (Pop. 16,661). There, Marshall discovers that Eerie, as he puts it, "is the center of weirdness for the universe". Elvis lives there, so do a pair of twins who stay young by sleeping in Tupperware, and many other strange things. Each episode, Marshall and his friend Simon collect evidence about the creepy things that happen there.

Eerie, Indiana: The Other Dimension.title: Eerie, Indiana: The Other Dimension
Eerie, Indiana: The Other Dimension.actors: Bill Switzer, Daniel Clark, Deborah Odell, Lindy Booth
Eerie, Indiana: The Other Dimension.plot: The series revolves around best friends Mitchell Taylor and Stanley Hope. Like earlier Eerie, Indiana, residents Marshall Teller and Simon Holmes and they are constantly encountering strange and out-of-this-world phenomena in their hometown. Helping out in their adventures is the mysterious local bartender, Mr. Crawford. The show is technically a spin-off of "Eerie, Indiana" (1991), since it takes place in a parallel universe Eerie that gets "infected" by weirdness when a villain opens a portal from the original Eerie to this one in the first episode of this show.

F-Zero.title: F-Zero GP Legend
F-Zero.actors: Amy Birnbaum, Gregory Abbey, Dan Green, Veronica Taylor
F-Zero.plot: Based on the classic Nintendo series, GP Legend tells the story of Rick Wheeler, a detective who wakes up from a cryogenic sleep from an accident while pursuing an escaped villian named Zoda. He discovers that he is alive in the year 2201. He ends up competing in the F-Zero racing tournament where many beings from across the galaxy compete. He also joins the Mobile Task Force, a special police force that investigates crime in the F-Zero circuit. While Rick is competing in the races, he's also to capture a dangerous villian named Black Shadow and his Dark Million Orginization. That organization also was responsible for cryogenically evolving Rick's old enemy Zoda, who is the other reason why Rick's on the team. Sometimes, he'll have an encounterment with the legendary racer and bounty hunter named Captain Falcon.

Fun House.title: Fun House
Fun House.plot: TV game show for kids. 2 teams compete against each other for the chance to enter the final game, the funhouse, where they collect prizes on the way through.

Funky Cops.title: Funky Cops
Funky Cops.actors: Frederick B. Owens, David Gasman, Thomas M. Pollard, Andrew Rannells
Funky Cops.plot: A 1970's cop show inspired spoof that records the misadventures of two undercover agents on the police force who become stars at a San Francisco disco scene.

Godzilla: The Series.title: Godzilla: The Series
Godzilla: The Series.actors: Ian Ziering, Malcolm Danare, Rino Romano, Charity James
Godzilla: The Series.plot: In this direct sequel to the 1998 Godzilla movie, Dr. Nico Tatopoulos leads a team, known as H.E.A.T, to battle giant monsters with the help of Godzilla's only living offspring.

Galidor: Defenders of the Outer Dimensio.title: Galidor: Defenders of the Outer Dimension
Galidor: Defenders of the Outer Dimensio.actors: Matthew Ewald, Marie-Marguerite Sabongui, Sam Magdi, Jeff Hall
Galidor: Defenders of the Outer Dimensio.plot: On his birthday, Nick Bluetooth recieves some kind of map that takes him and his best friend, Allegra Zane, to a ship (which is shaped like an egg). A robot named Jens on the ship thinks they two teens have comes to save the Outer Dimension from an evil overlord. With the help of a power known as "glitching", which helps him to change his arms and legs into things he finds along his travels, Nick plans to find the pieces of the Key to Galidor to rescue the Outer Dimension.

Goosebumps.title: Goosebumps
Goosebumps.writer: Darren Lemke (screenplay by), Scott Alexander (story by), Larry Karaszewski (story by), R.L. Stine (based on the "Goosebumps" books written by)
Goosebumps.actors: Jack Black, Dylan Minnette, Odeya Rush, Ryan Lee
Goosebumps.plot: First this is all about monsters and any kind of supernatural .After going to a new small town,the teenager boy Zach Cooper (Dylan Minnette) he meets the beautiful girl, Hannah (Odeya Rush), living right next door. But every silver lining has a cloud, and Zach's comes when he learns that Hannah has a mysterious dad who is revealed to be R. L. Stine (Jack Black), the author of the bestselling Goosebumps series. It turns out that there is a reason why Stine is so strange... he is a prisoner of his own imagination - the monsters that his books made famous are real, and Stine protects his readers by keeping them locked up in their books. Zach unintentionally unleashes the monsters from their manuscripts and they begin to terrorize the town, it's suddenly up to Stine, Zach, Hannah, and Zach's friend Champ (Ryan Lee) they all do their best to back all of the monsters in the book.

George of the Jungle.title: George of the Jungle
George of the Jungle.writer: Jay Ward (characters), Dana Olsen (story), Dana Olsen (screenplay), Audrey Wells (screenplay)
George of the Jungle.actors: Brendan Fraser, Leslie Mann, Thomas Haden Church, Richard Roundtree
George of the Jungle.plot: Baby George got into a plane crash in a jungle, stayed alive and was adopted by a wise ape. Ursula Stanhope, US noble woman is saved from death on safari by grown-up George, and he takes her to jungle to live with him. He slowly learns a rules of human relationships, while Ursula's lover Lyle is looking for her and the one who took her. After they are found, Ursula takes George to the USA.

Ghostwriter.title: Ghostwriter
Ghostwriter.actors: Blaze Berdahl, David López, Marcella Lowery, Tram-Anh Tran
Ghostwriter.plot: The show is about a group of teens who goes around solving neighborhood crimes and mysteries in New York City as young detectives with the help of a very secretive friend: Ghostwriter! Ghostwriter cannot hear, talk, smell, or feel. He can only read and write. He only sees words. No one else can see him but the Ghostwriter Team! In additions, the Ghostwriter Team have to solve their own mystery: who was Ghostwriter?

G.I. Joe: Sigma 6.title: G.I. Joe: Sigma 6
G.I. Joe: Sigma 6.actors: Eric Stuart, Michael Sinterniklaas, Scott Rayow, Amy Birnbaum
G.I. Joe: Sigma 6.plot: G.I. Joe has been the Real American Hero for over twenty years, and is now jumping into the 21st Century with both feet forwards. Showing in half hour blocks, the producers promise a solid continuity throughout the episodes, starting off with the ever-popular five-part miniseries much as the animated series of the 80's used to do.

The Incredible Crash Dummies.title: The Incredible Crash Dummies
The Incredible Crash Dummies.actors: John Stocker, Dan Hennessey, James Rankin, Michael Caruana
The Incredible Crash Dummies.plot: Slick and Spin seek out to find the evil Junkman, who stole Ted's new body the Torso 9000

Kong: The Animated Series.title: Kong: The Animated Series
Kong: The Animated Series.actors: Kirby Morrow, Saffron Henderson, Daphne Goldrick, David Kaye
Kong: The Animated Series.plot: When King Kong fell to his tragic death off the Empire State Building, there was a young scientist Dr. Lorna Jenkins who cloned him and took him back to Kong Island so he could finally be protected again from the world. Eighteen years later her grandson Jason and friend Tan bring their teacher to the island to show him the paradise and of course Kong. But their teacher Ramon De La Porta has other plans, he steals the island's Primal Stones which control the balance of the island and make sure the imprisoned god Chyros does not escape. So now to restore balance to the island Jason, Tan, a shaman girl named Lua and of course Kong must journey around the world to retrieve the stones and stop De La Porta once and for all.

Life with Louie.title: Life with Louie
Life with Louie.actors: Louie Anderson, Edie McClurg, Justin Shenkarow, Miko Hughes
Life with Louie.plot: Adventures of Louie Anderson as a child, growing up with his sweet-hearted mother, his loud and war crazed father, his 10 siblings, and children at school who love to tease him.

Little Dracula.title: Little Dracula
Little Dracula.actors: Françoise Blanchard, Bernard Bollet, Marc Bretonnière, Joey Camen

Los Luchadores.title: Los Luchadores
Los Luchadores.actors: Gary Lam, Maximo Morrone, Levi James, Sarah Carter

Mad Jack the Pirate.title: Mad Jack the Pirate
Mad Jack the Pirate.actors: Charlie Adler, Jocelyn Blue, Cam Clarke, Robert Pike Daniel
Mad Jack the Pirate.plot: Series about a luckless pirate and his anthropomorphic rat sidekick, Snuk.

Martin Mystery.title: Martin Mystery
Martin Mystery.genre: Animation, Action, Comedy, Fantasy, Horror, Mystery, Sci-Fi
Martin Mystery.actors: Sam Vincent, Kelly Sheridan, Teryl Rothery, Dale Wilson
Martin Mystery.plot: MARTIN MYSTERY is a dripping goo-fest of slime, thrills and comedy, starring Martin and Diana: two mismatched teenagers with hilariously opposite personalities on a mission to investigate the weirdest paranormal enigmas and the slimiest creatures from beyond. Commissioned by "THE CENTER" - an undercover bureau specializing in mysterious phenomena - and with the help of Java, a massive caveman lost in time, they leap from their average school duties to eerie slime-dripping caves and lairs.

Masked Rider.title: Masked Rider
Masked Rider.actors: Ted Jan Roberts, Rheannon Slover, Ashton McArn, Paul Pistore
Masked Rider.plot: Masked Rider is a 1995 live action television series which serves as a spin-off of Power Rangers.

Medabots.title: Medabots
Medabots.actors: Laurent Vernin, Dwayne Hill, Julie Lemieux, Terry McGurrin
Medabots.plot: In the year 2122, Ikki and children like him have pet robots called medabots, with A.I. (artificial intelligence) capabilities. They take their medabots and robattle against each other until a champion medabot team is determined.

Mighty Morphin Power Rangers.title: Mighty Morphin Power Rangers
Mighty Morphin Power Rangers.actors: Richard Steven Horvitz, David Yost, Ed Neil, David J. Fielding
Mighty Morphin Power Rangers.plot: Four athletically able teenagers along with their brainy friend Billy are selected by Zordon to fight the evil of Rita Repulsa, her monsters and her minions after the witch is accidentally released from imprisonment in an intergalactic dumpster on the moon. Later in the series, the rangers are joined by Tommy, the once evil Green Ranger designed for Rita's evil, but later was deprogrammed and spent two portions of the series briefly as the Green Ranger. Over time, some rangers had to pass their powers to others as well. Action scenes and scenes with Rita were edited from footage based on Japanese action sagas. Replacement villain Lord Zedd was designed in the U.S.

Mystic Knights of Tir Na Nog.title: Mystic Knights of Tir Na Nog
Mystic Knights of Tir Na Nog.actors: Lochlann O'Mearáin, Lisa Dwan, Justin Pierre, Vincent Walsh
Mystic Knights of Tir Na Nog.plot: The story is based on Celtic legends. When a tyrant queen from the land of Temra invades the peaceful land of Kells, King Conchobar must rely on an ancient legend which foretells of an ...

Monster Rancher.title: Monster Rancher
Monster Rancher.actors: Andrew Francis, Janyse Jaud, Scott McNeil, Maggie Blue O'Hara
Monster Rancher.plot: Genki is a young teen boy who gets zapped into an alternate world called Monster Rancher (Monster Farm in the Japanese version) where he must stop the evil Moo which can only be done by reviving the Phoenix, along his journey he befriends new Monsters and a girl named Holly.

Magic Adventures of Mumfie.title: Magic Adventures of Mumfie
Magic Adventures of Mumfie.plot: When he decides he has had enough of his quiet, dull life, Mumfie the elephant sets out into the world to find an adventure. Along the way he meets Scarecrow, Pinky, a flying pig and other strange new friends. But Mumfie's adventures are only just beginning. When he lands on a strange island run by a sinister secretary he becomes involved in his evil plans to find the Queen of Night's magic cloak and to take over the island.

The Magic School Bus.title: The Magic School Bus
The Magic School Bus.writer: Joanna Cole, Bruce Degen, Kristin Laskas Martin
The Magic School Bus.actors: Lily Tomlin, Daniel DeSanto, Erica Luttrell, Tara Meyer
The Magic School Bus.plot: In a small grade school, one class has a unique way of learning about the world with their teacher, Ms. Frizzle. To illustrate the science concepts they discuss, they always take a field trip on the Magic School Bus, a magic vehicle that can literally go anywhere and be anything as the class explores space, the arctic, the human body, and more in order to have a firsthand experience of the principles of science.

Mighty Mouse: The New Adventures.title: Mighty Mouse, the New Adventures
Mighty Mouse: The New Adventures.actors: Patrick Pinney, Dana Hill, Rodger Bumpass, Michael Pataki
Mighty Mouse: The New Adventures.plot: Mighty Mouse has humorous, satirical adventures in this short-lived Saturday Morning cartoon by Ralph Bakshi.

The Mr. Potato Head Show.title: The Mr. Potato Head Show
The Mr. Potato Head Show.actors: Kevin Carlson, James Murray, Debra Wilson, Brian Jacobs
The Mr. Potato Head Show.plot: Mr. Potato Head is working at a television studio producing fresh new shows, but he can't do it without his friends.

Mon Colle Knights.title: Mon Colle Knights
Mon Colle Knights.actors: Priscila Amorim, Ângela Bonatti, Guilherme Briggs, Indiane Christine

Mummies Alive!.title: Mummies Alive!
Mummies Alive!.actors: Scott McNeil, Dale Wilson, Graeme Kingston, Cree Summer
Mummies Alive!.plot: In ancient Egypt, an evil sorcerer named Scarab, kills the pharaoh's son, Prince Rapses, so he can become immortal. Entombed alive for his crime, Scarab revives in the modern world and begins his search for Rapses' reincarnation, a San Francisco-dwelling boy named Presley Carnovan to retrieve the spirit of Rapses' so he can become immortal. Rapses' (Presley's) bodyguards, Ja-Kal, Rath, Armon, and Nefer-Tina, along with Rapses' cat, Kahti, awake from the dead to protect him from Scarab. They use the power of Ra to transform into powerful guardians.

Mowgli: The New Adventures of the Jungle.title: Mowgli: The New Adventures of the Jungle Book
Mowgli: The New Adventures of the Jungle.writer: Timothy Scott Bogart, James Hereth, Guy Toubes
Mowgli: The New Adventures of the Jungle.actors: Sean Price McConnell, Lindsey Peter, Bart Braverman, Richard Assad
Mowgli: The New Adventures of the Jungle.plot: In this contemporary adaptation, Mowgli is joined on his adventures by a young American girl named, Nahbiri, who has accompanied her widowed doctor father to Jabalpur.

Moolah Beach.title: Moolah Beach
Moolah Beach.actors: J.D. Roth, Chasati Allen, Xavier Yepez, Jacob Capito
Moolah Beach.plot: 12 teens compete in a Survivor like game for a grand prize of $25,000.

NASCAR Racers.title: NASCAR Racers
NASCAR Racers.actors: Kathleen Barr, Ian James Corlett, Jim Byrnes, Roger Cross
NASCAR Racers.plot: The good Team Fastex races against the evil Team Rexcor.

Ned's Newt.title: Ned's Newt
Ned's Newt.plot: Ned Flemkin is a lonely child until he finally saves up enough money to buy a pet newt. But when Newton the newt eats too much Zippo brand newt food, he turns into a 500 pound fast-talking morph-a-minute behemoth whose desire to please his owner knows no bounds...

Ninja Turtles: The Next Mutation.title: Saban's Ninja Turtles: The Next Mutation
Ninja Turtles: The Next Mutation.actors: Jarred Blancard, Mitchell A. Lee Yuen, Dean Choe, Richard Yee
Ninja Turtles: The Next Mutation.plot: In this live-action TV series, the Turtles are older than in the movies or cartoon, and are joined by a fifth, female Turtle. "Venus De Milo" mutated with the other 4 Turtles but was washed away with the current in the sewer into New York's Chinatown before Splinter came across the turtles. After learning the Shinobi arts in China for 17 years, Venus has returned to New York. The Turtles are now faced with new villains such as Dragon Lord, Bonesteel and Vam Mi.

One Piece.title: One Piece
One Piece.actors: Mayumi Tanaka, Tony Beck, Laurent Vernin, Akemi Okamura
One Piece.plot: There once lived a pirate named Gol D. Roger. He obtained wealth, fame, and power to earn the title of Pirate King. When he was captured and about to be executed, he revealed that his treasure called One Piece was hidden somewhere at the Grand Line. This made all people set out to search and uncover the One Piece treasure, but no one ever found the location of Gol D. Roger's treasure, and the Grand Line was too dangerous a place to overcome. Twenty-two years after Gol D. Roger's death, a boy named Monkey D. Luffy decided to become a pirate and search for Gol D. Roger's treasure to become the next Pirate King.

Peter Pan and the Pirates.title: Peter Pan and the Pirates
Peter Pan and the Pirates.plot: Peter Pan lives in the Neverland with a gang of orphan boys, fairy Tinkerbell, and friends Wendy, John, and Michael Darling. Amid numerous adventures, the children are constantly menaced by pirate Captain James Hook and his band of no-goods.

Piggsburg Pigs!.title: Piggsburg Pigs
Piggsburg Pigs!.actors: Harvey Atkin, Robert Bockstael, Robert Cait, Len Carlson

The Plucky Duck Show.title: The Plucky Duck Show
The Plucky Duck Show.actors: Joe Alaskey, Don Messick, Charlie Adler, Tress MacNeille
The Plucky Duck Show.plot: A spin-off of the Tiny Toons animated series featuring junior egomaniac Plucky Duck. With the help of his sidekick, Hampton, Plucky embarks on his never-ending quest for fame, fortune and a...

Power Rangers in Space.title: Power Rangers in Space
Power Rangers in Space.actors: Tracy Lynn Cruz, Patricia Ja Lee, Roger Velasco, Christopher Khayman Lee
Power Rangers in Space.plot: The most evil forces of the universe (Rita & Zedd, the Machine Empire and Divatox) have formed an alliance with the monarch of all evil, Dark Specter. With Zordon as his prisoner, Dark Specter will use Zordon's powers to spread evil across the universe. Meanwhile Cassie, Ashley, Carlos and T.J. (4 of the 5 newest power rangers) have journeyed into space and teamed up with Andros, a human from the space colony of KO-35, in the mission to rescue Zordon. On their way they battle the forces of Dark Specter's most loyal servant, Astronema, the princess of evil. She and her army of monsters, star-fighters and Quantrons will stop at nothing to prevent the rangers from reaching Zordon.

Power Rangers Lightspeed Rescue.title: Power Rangers Lightspeed Rescue
Power Rangers Lightspeed Rescue.actors: Michael Chaturantabut, Sean Cw Johnson, Alison MacInnis, Keith Robinson
Power Rangers Lightspeed Rescue.plot: Five extraordinary teens carry on the legacy as the Lightspeed Power Rangers, the newest and most powerful team of champions ever, dedicated to fighting evil and protecting all that is good. Whenever danger is at hand, these awesome superheroes rush to the rescue at the speed of light. The dreaded Diabolico and his army of sinister monsters wreak havoc wherever they go, but with powerful new Lightspeed Rescue Zords and amazing weapons, the Power Rangers take on this newest master of evil, battling to stop his destructive rampage and save the world.

Power Rangers Time Force.title: Power Rangers Time Force
Power Rangers Time Force.actors: Jason Faunt, Kevin Kleinberg, Michael Copon, Erin Cahill
Power Rangers Time Force.plot: When a crimelord from the year 3000 finds that times are too tough, he goes back in time to 2001. And the Power Rangers of year 3000 come back to battle him. Things only get crazier when the bad guy masters time travel, allowing him to pop up wherever he wants in the timestream.

Power Rangers Turbo.title: Power Rangers Turbo
Power Rangers Turbo.actors: Blake Foster, Gregg Bullock, Carol Hoyt, Donene Kistler
Power Rangers Turbo.plot: Divatox has begun her invasion on Earth and the Power Rangers trade in their Zeo crystal powers for Turbo technology powers to combat this new threat.

Power Rangers Wild Force.title: Power Rangers Wild Force
Power Rangers Wild Force.actors: Ricardo Medina Jr., Alyson Sullivan, Phillip Jeanmarie, Jessica Rey
Power Rangers Wild Force.plot: Power Rangers Wild Force takes place in a city known as Turtle Lake, where evil creatures of the past called The Orgs have returned from their long slumber to cause havoc on earth! As The Orgs return, Princess Shayla of the floating sky island, Animarium, summons forth a group of young adults to call forth the powers of - Power Rangers Wild Force! Together, the Rangers and their Zords must save the planet from Master Org and his minions.

Power Rangers Zeo.title: Power Rangers Zeo
Power Rangers Zeo.actors: Catherine Sutherland, Nakia Burrise, Steve Cardenas, Johnny Yong Bosch
Power Rangers Zeo.plot: Tommy, Billy, Adam, Rocky, Kat and Tanya are turned back to their teenage forms thanks to the Zeo Crystal. The Command Center is gone but the crystal leads them to the new Power Chamber and all but Billy take on new Zeo powers.

Pirate Islands.title: Pirate Islands
Pirate Islands.actors: Brooke Harman, Nicholas Donaldson, Eliza Taylor, Oliver Ackland
Pirate Islands.plot: A freak accident sends three Australian kids into a computer-generated world of pirates and swashbuckling heroes. The kids must help a group of adventurers find a buried treasure and a way back to the real world.

The Ripping Friends.title: The Ripping Friends
The Ripping Friends.actors: Mike MacDonald, Michael Kerr, Merwin Mondesir, Mark Dailey
The Ripping Friends.plot: The misadventures of a quartet of muscleheaded superheroes.

Red Planet.title: Red Planet
Red Planet.writer: Chuck Pfarrer (story), Chuck Pfarrer (screenplay), Jonathan Lemkin (screenplay)
Red Planet.actors: Val Kilmer, Carrie-Anne Moss, Tom Sizemore, Benjamin Bratt
Red Planet.plot: In the near future, Earth is dying. A new colony on Mars could be humanity's only hope. A team of American astronauts, each a specialist in a different field, is making the first manned expedition to the red planet and must struggle to overcome the differences in their personalities, backgrounds and ideologies for the overall good of the mission. When their equipment suffers life-threatening damage and the crew must depend on one another for survival on the hostile surface of Mars, their doubts, fears and questions about God, man's destiny and the nature of the universe become defining elements in their fates. In this alien environment they must come face to face with their most human selves.

Round the Twist.title: Round the Twist
Round the Twist.actors: Mark Mitchell, Esben Storm, Rian McLean, Mathew Waters
Round the Twist.plot: Tony Twist and his three children - thirteen year old twins Pete and Linda and seven year old Bronson - move to an old lighthouse on the rugged Australian Coast. They soon discover that the lighthouse, and the outhouse, are haunted.

Sam & Max: Freelance Police!!!.title: The Adventures of Sam & Max: Freelance Police
Sam & Max: Freelance Police!!!.actors: Harvey Atkin, Rob Tinkler, Tony Daniels, Catherine Disher
Sam & Max: Freelance Police!!!.plot: The continuing adventures of Sam the Bogart-like dog and Max the hyper-kinetic bunny.

The Spooktacular New Adventures of Caspe.title: The Spooktacular New Adventures of Casper
The Spooktacular New Adventures of Caspe.actors: Malachi Pearson, Joe Alaskey, Dan Castellaneta, Rob Paulsen
The Spooktacular New Adventures of Caspe.plot: The continuing adventures of Casper, The Trio, and the Harveys, based on the popular 1995 film.

Sherlock Holmes in the 22nd Century.title: Sherlock Holmes in the 22nd Century
Sherlock Holmes in the 22nd Century.actors: Jason Gray-Stanford, John Payne, Akiko Morison, Viv Leacock
Sherlock Holmes in the 22nd Century.plot: A defrosted Holmes teams with a robotic Watson and a female Inspector Lestrade to stop the criminal rampage of Moriarty's clone.

Space Goofs.title: Space Goofs
Space Goofs.actors: Charlie Adler, Patrick Préjean, Maurice LaMarche, Danny Mann
Space Goofs.plot: Five bizarre-looking aliens crashland on Earth. With no way to return home, they find themselves trying to make sense of Earth life from the confines of a rented house.

Sonic Underground.title: Sonic Underground
Sonic Underground.genre: Animation, Action, Adventure, Comedy, Family, Fantasy, Music, Musical, Sci-Fi, Thriller
Sonic Underground.actors: Maurice LaMarche, Garry Chalk, Gail Webster, Peter Wilds
Sonic Underground.plot: In this 3rd cartoon of Sonic the Hedgehog, Sonic and his two siblings, Manic and Sonia are the hit rock band, Sonic Undeground. But in reality they are the children of Queen Aleana, the queen of Mobius. Queen Aleana was abandoned from Mobius by Sonic's enemy, Dr. Robotnik who turned Mobius into a waste land. So now Sonic, Manic and Sonia must fight Dr. Robotnik and his two sidekicks, Sleet and Dingo and the SWAT Bots, with the aid of their metal medallions and bring peace to Mobius and find mother! Will the hedgehogs find their mother? Will they defeat Robotnik? The resistance begins on Sonic Undergroud!

Spider-Man.title: Spider-Man
Spider-Man.writer: Stan Lee (Marvel comic book), Steve Ditko (Marvel comic book), David Koepp (screenplay)
Spider-Man.actors: Tobey Maguire, Willem Dafoe, Kirsten Dunst, James Franco
Spider-Man.plot: Based on Marvel Comics' superhero character, this is a story of Peter Parker who is a nerdy high-schooler. He was orphaned as a child, bullied by jocks, and can't confess his crush for his stunning neighborhood girl Mary Jane Watson. To say his life is "miserable" is an understatement. But one day while on an excursion to a laboratory a runaway radioactive spider bites him... and his life changes in a way no one could have imagined. Peter acquires a muscle-bound physique, clear vision, ability to cling to surfaces and crawl over walls, shooting webs from his wrist ... but the fun isn't going to last. An eccentric millionaire Norman Osborn administers a performance enhancing drug on himself and his maniacal alter ego Green Goblin emerges. Now Peter Parker has to become Spider-Man and take Green Goblin to the task... or else Goblin will kill him. They come face to face and the war begins in which only one of them will survive at the end.
Spider-Man.awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 16 wins & 58 nominations.

Spider-Man Unlimited.title: Spider-Man Unlimited
Spider-Man Unlimited.actors: Rino Romano, Kathleen Barr, Paul Dobson, Akiko Morison
Spider-Man Unlimited.plot: Covering a shuttle launch to the planet known as Counter-Earth, Peter Parker discovers the symbiote villians, Venom and Carnage, boarding the craft as it launches. When he is unable to stop them as Spider-Man and contact is lost with the shuttle, he is blamed for the disaster and hunted until he is believed to have been killed in a fire.
